description: CRM Meeting Field Schema for AG-L56V52BMMW

standard__activity_manually_logged.description: Whether the activity was manually logged
standard__activity_manually_logged.title: Manually logged

standard__activity_meeting_analysis_proc.description: Processed transcript ID of the meeting analysis
standard__activity_meeting_analysis_proc.title: Meeting transcript ID

standard__activity_meeting_duration.description: Duration of the meeting in milliseconds.
standard__activity_meeting_duration.title: Meeting duration

standard__activity_meeting_internal_note.description: Internal notes you take for your team not included in the meeting description.
standard__activity_meeting_internal_note.title: Meeting internal notes

standard__activity_meeting_last_analyzed.description: Last analyzed by AI date of the meeting
standard__activity_meeting_last_analyzed.title: Meeting last analyzed date

standard__activity_meeting_location.description: Where the meeting takes place. The value could be a physical address, a conference room, a videoconference link, or a phone number.
standard__activity_meeting_location.title: Meeting location

standard__activity_meeting_outcome.description: Outcome of the meeting, e.g.: SCHEDULED, COMPLETED, RESCHEDULED, NO_SHOW, CANCELLED
standard__activity_meeting_outcome.title: Meeting outcome

standard__activity_meeting_status.description: Meeting status ex. SCHEDULED, COMPLETED, RESCHEDULED, etc.
standard__activity_meeting_status.title: Meeting status

standard__activity_meeting_summary_body.description: Body of the summary of the meeting
standard__activity_meeting_summary_body.title: Meeting summary body

standard__activity_meeting_summary_title.description: Title of the summary of the meeting
standard__activity_meeting_summary_title.title: Meeting summary title

standard__activity_meeting_url.description: Link to a calendar, for example Google Calendar, Calendar Hero, etc.
standard__activity_meeting_url.title: Meeting URL

standard__activity_name.description: Display name used when showing a summary of the activity.
standard__activity_name.title: Name

standard__activity_source_name.description: Name of the app or external system that created the activity. E.g. 'Salesforce', 'Hubspot', 'Gmail'
standard__activity_source_name.title: Record source

standard__activity_tags.description: List of tags useful for segmentation of activities.
standard__activity_tags.title: Tags

standard__activity_url.description: Link to more information about the activity.
standard__activity_url.title: URL

standard__activity_url_name.description: Name of the link to more information about the activity.
standard__activity_url_name.title: URL name

system__activity_external_id.description: External identifier for the record, optional
system__activity_external_id.title: External ID

system__activity_updated.description: When the record was last updated
system__activity_updated.title: Updated date

title: CRM Meeting
